fragments.text: We can kill the linnorm Fafnheir.

We can unite the Linnorm Kings.
We can unite the Linnorm Kings.
And we can fight Baba Yaga from the lands of our people

He throws muscled arm around his stout younger brother, Vlag Unterson, and says
, "But only if we don't fight each other and we don't get harassed by the Gendarmes."

, "But only if we don't fight each other and we don't get harassed by the Gendarmes."
, "But only if we don't fight each other and we don't get harassed by the Gendarmes."
The brothers round the third bend of Calphiak Pass and see a hundred feet away Gendarmes near a wood shack and fire guarding the entrance and haze of Riddleport.
The brothers round the third bend of Calphiak Pass and see a hundred feet away Gendarmes near a wood shack and fire guarding the entrance and haze of Riddleport.
Riddleport is nestled between two steep ridges of the Calphiak Mountains and united by the riddles of greed, magic and Overlord Gaston Cromarcky.
Riddleport is nestled between two steep ridges of the Calphiak Mountains and united by the riddles of greed, magic and Overlord Gaston Cromarcky.
A riddle for newcomers to Riddleport is its law.
A riddle for newcomers to Riddleport is its law.
One answer to the riddle is pay the Overlord Gaston Cromarcky.
One answer to the riddle is pay the Overlord Gaston Cromarcky.
The other answer to the riddle is befriend the Gendarmes: the mercenaries, extortionists and bribe collectors of Gaston.
The other answer to the riddle is befriend the Gendarmes: the mercenaries, extortionists and bribe collectors of Gaston.
Gendarmes trip many merchants and many pirates with their law and their guisarme.
Gendarmes trip many merchants and many pirates with their law and their guisarme.
Gendarmes enforce their law with the blade of a guisarme.
Gendarmes enforce their law with the blade of a guisarme.
Their law is Riddleport's law: pay.
Their law is Riddleport's law: pay.
The Unterson brothers's first riddle of Riddleport is how to make it through Calphiak Pass into Riddleport without paying the Gendarmes.
The Unterson brothers's first riddle of Riddleport is how to make it through Calphiak Pass into Riddleport without paying the Gendarmes.
As the brothers step closer to the Gendarmes and Riddleport, they leave their family a half-day's longboat row to the coastal south.
As the brothers step closer to the Gendarmes and Riddleport, they leave their family a half-day's longboat row to the coastal south.
Soarin and Vlag longboated from Unter Village over the waters of Varisa Bay during the morning after dad said
, "Soarin, you are too big to feed.
Soarin and Vlag longboated from Unter Village over the waters of Varisa Bay during the morning after dad said
, "Soarin, you are too big to feed.
, "Soarin, you are too big to feed.
And Vlag, you are too wild to tame.
And Vlag, you are too wild to tame.
Both Baba Yaga Sneak Attack each other much."
Both Baba Yaga Sneak Attack each other much."
Both Soarin and Vlag knew it was time to make room for the new baby and the other six siblings.
Both Soarin and Vlag knew it was time to make room for the new baby and the other six siblings.
The brothers packed rope, blankets, flint and steel, fish hooks and net, canvas sheets, waterskins and dried fish.
The brothers packed rope, blankets, flint and steel, fish hooks and net, canvas sheets, waterskins and dried fish.
Vlag pulled leather armor over hide pants and shirt.
Vlag pulled leather armor over hide pants and shirt.
He hit spear against shield while Soarin dressed his bear skin fur over hide pants and jacket.
He hit spear against shield while Soarin dressed his bear skin fur over hide pants and jacket.
They rowed from Unter Village to Riddleport on the longboat with father.
They rowed from Unter Village to Riddleport on the longboat with father.
Soarin and Vlag felt excited fear not knowing if they'd see their clan again.
Soarin and Vlag felt excited fear not knowing if they'd see their clan again.
Vlag knew they weren't selling fish, and Soarin's loins stirred at the tales of Riddleport's ladies.
Vlag knew they weren't selling fish, and Soarin's loins stirred at the tales of Riddleport's ladies.
The longboat beached the rough shore outside Riddleport to avoid fees and bribes and cast-off the brothers to earn their own way in the world.
The longboat beached the rough shore outside Riddleport to avoid fees and bribes and cast-off the brothers to earn their own way in the world.
, "Don't Baba Yaga Sneak Attack your brooder in Riddleport.
, "Don't Baba Yaga Sneak Attack your brooder in Riddleport.
, "Don't Baba Yaga Sneak Attack your brooder in Riddleport.

, "May you come back on a Red Sunset."
, "May you come back on a Red Sunset."
, "May you come back on a Red Sunset."
Soarin and Vlag walked the shore from the boat to the trees and a one-wagon road North.
Soarin and Vlag walked the shore from the boat to the trees and a one-wagon road North.
They walked through Shoanti territory to the two-wagon road West to Riddleport.
They walked through Shoanti territory to the two-wagon road West to Riddleport.
Along Calphiak Pass before it opens to the smoke haze of Riddleport, a few Gendarmes pull their blood red cloaks over shoulders.
Along Calphiak Pass before it opens to the smoke haze of Riddleport, a few Gendarmes pull their blood red cloaks over shoulders.
They look through smoldering peat smoke, rub their hands, swat large mosquitoes and look at the approaching Unterson brothers.
They look through smoldering peat smoke, rub their hands, swat large mosquitoes and look at the approaching Unterson brothers.
A bearded Gendarme points tip of a guisarme at the brothers and talks too distant to be heard by the brothers.
A bearded Gendarme points tip of a guisarme at the brothers and talks too distant to be heard by the brothers.
, "Me brooder, we going to make you a man.
, "Me brooder, we going to make you a man.
, "Me brooder, we going to make you a man.
His muscled arm squeezes Vlag's skinny but sturdy body.
His muscled arm squeezes Vlag's skinny but sturdy body.
Vlag's strong body feels the strength of Soarin, but not the pain of Soarin's squeeze.
Vlag's strong body feels the strength of Soarin, but not the pain of Soarin's squeeze.
He pushes from Soarin as Soarin releases squeeze.
He pushes from Soarin as Soarin releases squeeze.
Soarin spreads arms through humidity showing his tattoos.
Soarin spreads arms through humidity showing his tattoos.
"You may not be the baby, but you've not pillaged a woman with your spear, so she can show you how to use it to be a man."
"You may not be the baby, but you've not pillaged a woman with your spear, so she can show you how to use it to be a man."
Vlag pounds forearm against chest and thick leather armor.
Vlag pounds forearm against chest and thick leather armor.
I know how to use my spear."
I know how to use my spear."
"Brooder, you were playing with ladies and gramooder while I worked the boat with faughter."
"Brooder, you were playing with ladies and gramooder while I worked the boat with faughter."
"Oh yeah, brooder, I was playing with the ladies while you played with faughter."
"Oh yeah, brooder, I was playing with the ladies while you played with faughter."
"He make you a man with your spear?"
"He make you a man with your spear?"
He reaches and rubs the stubble on Vlag's cheek.
He reaches and rubs the stubble on Vlag's cheek.
Vlag pushes Soarin's arm and leans back and raises a fist.
Vlag pushes Soarin's arm and leans back and raises a fist.
They glare at each other then chuckle.
They glare at each other then chuckle.
The gust blows the blood red cloaks of the Gendarmes starring through pungent peat smoke at the brothers.
The gust blows the blood red cloaks of the Gendarmes starring through pungent peat smoke at the brothers.
He flexes muscles and whips long braided locks of blond hair over shoulders.
He flexes muscles and whips long braided locks of blond hair over shoulders.
He steps along road closer to the Gendarmes.
He steps along road closer to the Gendarmes.
Soarin's hair is woven with beads given to him by his grandma, the spiritual leader of the clan.
Soarin's hair is woven with beads given to him by his grandma, the spiritual leader of the clan.
Soarin's spiritual strength was felt since birth.
Soarin's spiritual strength was felt since birth.
Soarin learned from grandma the spirit ways and life's paths.
Soarin learned from grandma the spirit ways and life's paths.
Grandma showed Soarin how to reach to Untersons of Time Past for guidance and healing.
Grandma showed Soarin how to reach to Untersons of Time Past for guidance and healing.
His body's strength came from father and from wrestling his brother.
His body's strength came from father and from wrestling his brother.
His spiritual strength came from grandma and the tattoos.
His spiritual strength came from grandma and the tattoos.
Grandma told arcane stories while she tattooed Soarin's skin.
Grandma told arcane stories while she tattooed Soarin's skin.
She told stories of olden days when the fish brought word of the arcane to the shores of Thessalon.
She told stories of olden days when the fish brought word of the arcane to the shores of Thessalon.
She recounted tales of seafarers listening to the fish and learning great power from the fish.
She recounted tales of seafarers listening to the fish and learning great power from the fish.
She taught Soarin the great power of potions for fish need liquid while scribing the tales on his skin.
She taught Soarin the great power of potions for fish need liquid while scribing the tales on his skin.
Vlag teases his older and bigger brother about Soarin being able to cook a potion in the kitchen, but not fish over a campfire.
Vlag teases his older and bigger brother about Soarin being able to cook a potion in the kitchen, but not fish over a campfire.
Vlag learned to make a campfire from father after father pushed Vlag from the fishing boat into the icy ocean and shouted "BABA YAGA SNEAK ATTACK!"
Vlag learned to make a campfire from father after father pushed Vlag from the fishing boat into the icy ocean and shouted "BABA YAGA SNEAK ATTACK!"
Then father showed Vlag how to build a fire.
Then father showed Vlag how to build a fire.
As Vlag dried by fire, father told Vlag stories of their Linnorm ancestors fighting Baba Yaga from Hagsreach in the Land of Linnorm Kings.
As Vlag dried by fire, father told Vlag stories of their Linnorm ancestors fighting Baba Yaga from Hagsreach in the Land of Linnorm Kings.
Once dry, Vlag would try to Baba Yaga Sneak Attack Soarin using quickness and surprise to battle Soarin's strength.
Once dry, Vlag would try to Baba Yaga Sneak Attack Soarin using quickness and surprise to battle Soarin's strength.
Vlag became tough from getting beat by Soarin, rowing boats and hauling fishing nets since he was twelve.
Vlag became tough from getting beat by Soarin, rowing boats and hauling fishing nets since he was twelve.
He became quick by dodging his father's Baba Yaga Sneak Attacks.
He became quick by dodging his father's Baba Yaga Sneak Attacks.
After seven winters fishing, Vlag is not as strong as Soarin, but he can take a beating if he's caught.
After seven winters fishing, Vlag is not as strong as Soarin, but he can take a beating if he's caught.

We get you a tiefling to pillage.
